text: Edward Blood (August 15, 1908 - June 13, 1991) was an American skier. He competed in the Nordic combined events at the 1932 Winter Olympics and the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1991 deaths Category:American male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United States Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1932 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:People from Bradford, Vermont
title: Edward Blood
